casebody.data:
CATAWBA COUNTY, et al.
v.
LOGGINS 152PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 15, 2016 J. David Abernethy, Attorney at Law, David W. Hood, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency), et al. Blair E. Cody, III, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Loggins, Jason. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Benjamin J. Kull, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Health and Human Services.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of November 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of November 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 22nd day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
